document_name: Adaptation strategy to climate change in the Czech Republic
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CZE/2015/CZE-2015-01-10-Adaptation strategy to climate change in the Czech Republic_9f9f35fb495e2199744940ec6294a824.pdf
document_description: This strategy assesses the likely impacts of climate change, makes proposals for concrete adaptation measures, and discusses legislative and economic consequences. The document further focuses on the monitoring and analysis of adaptation on the environment and public health, but also on forestry, agriculture, water regime in the landscape and water management, urbanized landscape, biodiversity and ecosystem services, tourism, transport, industry and energy, emergencies and protection of the population.
